destinations.title: The Mission
destinations.name: Mission, Santa Barbara
destinations.description: Quaint mission founded in 1786 by Spanish Franciscans, still in use as a Catholic church

destinations.title: Stearns Warf
destinations.name: Stearns Wharf, Santa Barbara
destinations.address: S217 Stearns Wharf, Santa Barbara, CA 93101
destinations.description: Storied wooden wharf offering restaurants, varied shops, a small aquarium & water views

destinations.title: The Zoo
destinations.name: Santa Barbara Zoo
destinations.description: Small zoo with hundreds of animals in natural habitats, a miniature train ride & picnic spots

destinations.title: East Beach
destinations.name: East Beach, Santa Barbara
destinations.description: East Beach located in Santa Barbara, California is often the first beach seen upon entering the city limits. East Beach is separated from West Beach by Stearn's Wharf, and is proximal to downtown

destinations.title: El Presidio
destinations.name: El Presidio de Santa BÃ¡rbara State Historic Park
destinations.address: 123 E Canon Perdido St, Santa Barbara, CA 93101
destinations.description: Historical site housing remnants of a 1782 Spanish fortress, including 2 original adobe buildings

destinations.title: Arroyo Burro Beach
destinations.name: Arroyo Burro Beach
destinations.description: This oceanfront beach with seasonal lifeguards & a grassy area for picnicking allows off-leash dogs

destinations.title: County Courthouse
destinations.name: Santa Barbara County Courthouse
destinations.description: 1929 tile-roof courthouse complex known for a mural room & Spanish Colonial Revival embellishments

destinations.title: Lotusland
destinations.name: Lotusland
destinations.description: 37-acre estate & botanical garden with 3,000+ plants, including rare cycads, cacti & euphorbias

destinations.title: Botanic Garden
destinations.name: Santa Barbara Botanic Garden
destinations.address: 1212 Mission Canyon Rd, Santa Barbara, CA 93105
destinations.description: Enchanting garden featuring 5.5 miles of paths, authentic Japanese tea garden, redwood grove & more

destinations.title: Leadbetter Beach
destinations.name: Leadbetter Beach
destinations.description: City beach offering both white sand & a grass lawn, plus picnic areas, showers & restrooms

destinations.title: Old Mission
destinations.name: Old Mission Santa Barbara
destinations.description: Landmark 1786 Spanish mission with period art & artifacts, gardens with ocean views & a gift shop

destinations.title: Shoreline Park
destinations.name: Shoreline Park
destinations.address: Shoreline Dr & Santa Rosa Place, Santa Barbara, CA 93109
destinations.description: Popular park overlooking the water offers a playground, grassy areas, walking paths & beach access

destinations.title: Alice Keck Gardens
destinations.name: Alice Keck Park Memorial Gardens
destinations.address: 1500 Santa Barbara St, Santa Barbara, CA 93101
destinations.description: Lush garden with an array of tree & plant species, koi ponds, a picnic area & a butterfly garden

destinations.title: Museum Of Natural History
destinations.name: Santa Barbara Museum Of Natural History
destinations.address: 2559 Puesta Del Sol, Santa Barbara, CA 93105
destinations.description: Landmark with various exhibits including regional history, art, a planetarium & a butterfly garden

destinations.title: Chase Palm Park
destinations.name: Chase Palm Park
destinations.address: 323 E Cabrillo Blvd, Santa Barbara, CA 93101
destinations.description: Waterfront park lined with tall palm trees, offering lounging lawns & a walking/biking path

destinations.title: Museum Of Natural History Sea Center
destinations.name: Santa Barbara Museum of Natural History Sea Center
destinations.description: Aquatic exploration center with live shark touch pools, a tidepool tank & magnified sea specimens

destinations.title: Chumash Painted Cave
destinations.name: Chumash Painted Cave State Historic Park
destinations.description: Paintings by Native Americans of the 1600s & earlier decorate sandstone boulders underground

destinations.title: Museum Of Art
destinations.name: Santa Barbara Museum Of Art
destinations.description: Compact museum featuring 20th-century Western American paintings as well as modern Asian ceramics

destinations.title: Douglas Family Preserve
destinations.name: Douglas Family Preserve
destinations.description: Hiking paths & ocean views feature at this park with 70 acres of native trees & plants

destinations.title: MOXI, The Wolf Museum
destinations.name: MOXI, The Wolf Museum of Exploration + Innovation
destinations.description: Contemporary museum devoted to science, technology & the arts, with a focus on interactive exhibits
